dataIdInfo.idPurp:
This is the final Soil Burn Severity (SBS) map of the Cameron Peak Fire that burned in Colorado during 2020. The SBS for the Cameron Peak Fire was completed on 11/11/2020 using Burned Area Reflectance Classification (BARC) from 09/13/2020, 10/13/2020 and 11/02/2020. It was completed with limited field verification and satellite imagery was used to refine the SBS.
The gridcode values represent the following: 1 = Unburned to Very Low 2 = Low 3 = Moderate 4 = High
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Burned Area Emergency Response (BAER) Assessment Completion Date:11/11/2020 BAER Team GIS Analyst: Dolores Weisbaum and Janice Naylor BAER Team Leader: David Callery and Thomas Matthews Soil Burn Severity Analyst(s): Jori Johnson and Leah Shipstead

searchKeys.keyword: Cameron Peak 2020 BAER; Soil Burn Severity
